detailsofRole: Creating a complete site rebuild which handles the settings and live chat for user agents.
Fixing ongoing bugs on all pages within the site.
Using git to work on multiple features and bugs in a team and handling merge conflicts when they arise.
Working in an agile methodology with two week sprints.

Tech stack- React query (caching data for speed), Zustand (global state, lightweight alternative to Redux), Typescript, React router, React, Formik for forms, Yup for validation, Material UI and Styled components when required.

videos.title: All chat bot section
videos.description: Here I created the UI for the bot section which includes tab filters, search and pagination.

videos.title: Chat bot settings
videos.description: In this video I created the chat bot settings including the confidence slider, drag and drop button answer types with validation and the preview bot on the right.

videos.title: Live chat UI
videos.description: Creation of the livechat UI including side window with various tabs including AI powered suggestions

videos.title: Livechat video
videos.description: Creation of the live video during chat using the Microsoft Teams SDK

detailsofRole: Working with a wide variety of client websites including Hyundai UK national website.
Creating bespoke pages for new Hyundai campaigns and making amendments to existing pages.
Working in a development team using Jira and working closely with project managers.
Using SASS with BEM to create maintainable,scalable CSS and styled components on more recent projects using BrowserStack to test on all devices and platforms.
Developing the Hyundai car configurator for the national site using Gatsby, React, React router, React hooks, Redux and Styled components.
Working with the design team to update keys part of the Ocado Fetch website using CSS, HTML and Contentful from XD designs from the Graphic design team.
Using Contentful, Trello, Abode Creative Suite and Slack to make a high volume amount of website updates to specified deadlines.

projects.name: Ecommerce audio shop app
projects.description: Full stack e commerce store developed from sketch designs using the MERN stack, react testing library and several additional NPM packages such as Formik and React transition group.

projects.name: Kanban board
projects.description: Full stack kanban board using React, Typescript, Cypress and Jest testing and deployed on AWS with a CI/CD pipeline.

projects.name: Invoice application
projects.description: An invoice application created from sketch designs uses React, Formik and React Transition Group to create a visually pleasing and slick experience for the user.

projects.name: React calculator
projects.description: This calculator was built as a project as part of the freeCodeCamp cirriculum. This project allowed me to combine many functions and uses React prevstate and e.persist to make the project work.
